title: No response from support when trying to claim PAX rewards
body:
I've emailed riot twice to try and claim the rewards that they offered for users who bought PAX tickets before the date that riot announced that they wouldn't be at PAX.

I've sent them my receipt number for my two tickets and said if they need any additional information I can provide it but I haven't heard anything else back from them.

How should I proceed from here?

replies.body:
Hi Nedpool, your support ticket was picked up and is currently being escalated.
We are currently in the process of collecting the last batch of PAX ticket holders who we will be granting the skin to, so it is taking some time as we have to verify each one.
